structure.unit: State Recreation Areas Outside Of The Metropolitan Parks District

law.catch_line: Municipal Wastes; Discharge Into Ocean Sanctuaries; Variance
law.text: In cases where the prohibition in section fifteen against discharges of municipal wastes into the ocean sanctuaries may not further the purposes of the act, such discharges may be allowed; provided, however, that a suitable quality of effluent is achieved to protect the appearance, ecology, and marine resources of the sanctuary; and, provided further that the department of environmental protection, in its discretion, upon application, grants a variance from the prohibitions of said section fifteen for the proposed discharges, subject to the provisions of sections sixteen B to sixteen F, inclusive.
